name: Take Heart
effect:
The user increases its Special and Sp. Defense by 1 and cures any status conditions on itself. 
 At Silver Rank, this move also affects an ally.
 At Gold Rank, the User also restores 3 HP.
 At Platinum Rank, this move affects an additional ally.
 At Diamond Rank, the User also restores 1 Will.
description: The user lifts its own spirits, revitalizing itself and repreparing for the fight.
